message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair to me.
I think a 60/40 split, with me getting the larger share, is more fair, given that I'll be getting less money after each round due to the higher inflation rate. Let's see if you agree.
Bob, I understand the inflation puts more pressure on you. How about a compromise? 55/45 is more balanced than your last offer.
